trans-unit.source: The other part of the code that may be of interest is the feature detection code — to detect whether the browser supports <input type="datetime-local">, we create a new <input> element, try setting its type to datetime-local, then immediately check what its type is set to. Browsers that don't support datetime-local return text, since that's what datetime-local falls back to. If <input type="datetime-local"> is not supported, we hide the native picker and show the fallback picker UI (<select>) instead.

The other part of the code that may be of interest is the feature detection code — to detect whether the browser supports <input type="time">, we create a new <input> element, set its type to time, then immediately check what its type is set to — non-supporting browsers will return text, because the time type falls back to type text. If <input type="time"> is not supported, we hide the native picker and show the fallback picker UI (<select>s) instead.
trans-unit.target: 该代码的另一部分可能是有趣的功能检测代码—要检测浏览器是否支持 <input type="time"> ，我们创建一个新的 <input> 元素，将其 type 设置为 time ，然后立即检查类型设置为什么-不支持的浏览器将返回 text ，因为 time 类型回退为 text 类型。如果不支持 <input type="time"> ，我们将隐藏本机选择器，并显示后备选择器UI（ <select> s）。

trans-unit.source: The problem is with the client side of things: parsing of dates with more than 4 digits in the year.

The problem is with the server side of things: storage of dates greater than 2<sup>31</sup>-1. To fix this problem, you must store all dates using either unsigned 32-bit integers, signed 64-bit integers, or double-precision floating points on the server. If your server is written in PHP, the fix may be as simple as upgrading to PHP 8 or 7, and upgrading your hardware to x86_64 or IA64. If you are stuck with other hardware, you can try to emulate 64-bit hardware inside a 32-bit virtual machine, but most VMs don't support this kind of virtualization, stability may suffer, and performance will definately suffer greatly.

The problem with the above example is that the user will not know what the access key is! This is especially true since the modifiers are typically non-standard to avoid conflicts. When building a site, be sure to provide this information in a way that doesn't interfere with the site design (for example by providing an easily accessible link that points to information on what the site access keys are). Adding a tooltip to the button (using the title attribute) can also help, although it's not a complete solution for accessibility purposes.
trans-unit.target: 上面示例的问题是用户将不知道访问密钥是什么！尤其如此，因为修饰符通常是非标准的，以避免冲突。在构建网站时，请确保以不干扰网站设计的方式提供此信息（例如，通过提供易于访问的链接来指向有关网站访问键的信息）。向按钮添加工具提示（使用 title 属性）也可以提供帮助，尽管这并不是出于可访问性目的的完整解决方案。

trans-unit.source: The public key and challenge string are DER encoded as PublicKeyAndChallenge, and then digitally signed with the private key to produce a SignedPublicKeyAndChallenge. The SignedPublicKeyAndChallenge is Base64 encoded, and the ASCII data is finally submitted to the server as the value of a form name/value pair, where the name is name as specified by the name attribute of the keygen element. If no challenge string is provided, then it will be encoded as an IA5STRING of length zero.
trans-unit.target: 公钥和质询字符串被DER编码为 PublicKeyAndChallenge ，然后用私钥进行数字签名以生成 SignedPublicKeyAndChallenge 。所述 SignedPublicKeyAndChallenge 是的Base64编码，该ASCII数据最终提交到服务器作为一个形式名称/值对的值，其中名称是 name 由指定的 name 的属性 keygen 元件。如果未提供质询字符串，则它将被编码为长度为零的 IA5STRING 。

trans-unit.source: The second problem is the more serious one; with date input supported, the value is normalized to the format yyyy-mm-dd. But with a text input, the browser has no recognition of what format the date should be in, and there are many different formats in which people write dates. For example:

The second problem is the more serious. As mentioned earlier, with a week input the actual value is always normalized to the format yyyy-Www. When the browser falls back to a generic text input, there's nothing to guide the user toward correctly formatting the input (and it's certainly not intuitive). There are multiple ways in which people could write week values; for example:

trans-unit.source: The second problem is the more serious; as mentioned previously, time inputs' values are always normalized to the format hh:mm or hh:mm:ss. trans-unit.source: The size of the control is set to be 150 pixels long by 20 pixels tall. The margins are set to 0 and the transform-origin is shifted to the middle of the space the slider rotates through; since the slider is configured to be 150 pixels wide, it rotates through a box which is 150 pixels on each side. Offsetting the origin by 75px on each axis means we will rotate around the center of that space. Finally, we rotate counter-clockwise by 90°. The result: a range input which is rotated so the maximum value is at the top and the minimum value is at the bottom.
trans-unit.target: 控件的大小设置为150像素长x 20像素高。边距设置为0， transform-origin 移动到滑块旋转通过的空间的中间；由于滑块配置为150像素宽，因此它将旋转通过每边150像素的框。在每个轴上将原点偏移75像素，这意味着我们将围绕该空间的中心旋转。最后，我们将逆时针旋转90°。结果：旋转范围输入，因此最大值在顶部，最小值在底部。

Perhaps the browser offers the ability to save encrypted credit card information, for autocompletion following an authentication procedure.
trans-unit.target: 建议值的来源一般由浏览器决定;通常值来自用户过去输入的值,但也可能来自预先配置的值。例如,浏览器可能会让用户保存他们的姓名、地址、电话号码和电子邮件地址,以便于自动填写。也许浏览器提供了保存加密的信用卡信息的功能,以便在认证程序后自动完成。

trans-unit.source: The use of color is a fundamental form of human expression. Children experiment with color before they even have the manual dexterity to draw. Maybe that's why color is one of the first things people often want to experiment with when learning to develop web sites. With CSS, there are lots of ways to add color to your HTMLelements to create just the look you want. This article is a primer introducing each of the ways CSS color can be used in HTML.
trans-unit.target: 颜色的使用是人类表达的基本形式。孩子们甚至没有手工绘制的技巧之前就尝试颜色。也许这就是为什么颜色是人们在学习开发网站时经常要尝试的第一件事。使用CSS，有很多方法可以为HTML 元素添加颜色以创建所需的外观。本文是入门文章，介绍了可在HTML中使用CSS颜色的每种方式。

trans-unit.source: The use of color is a fundamental form of human expression. Children experiment with color before they even have the manual dexterity to draw. Maybe that's why color is one of the first things people often want to experiment with when learning to develop websites. With CSS, there are lots of ways to add color to your HTMLelements to create just the look you want. This article is a primer introducing each of the ways CSS color can be used in HTML.

The user enters four section headings into the Table of Contents (and presumably also writing paragraph material within these sections). The heading for each of the four sections would be assigned NAME values of "z0", "z1", "z2", and "z3". The first of these would produce an entry in the Table of Contents like this: <A NAME="z0" HREF="#z4">FIRST SECTION NAME</A> and the section header would be marked like this: <H2><A NAME="z4">FIRST SECTION NAME</A></H2>. This continues for the next three sections, z5, z6, and z7 (and Table of Contents entries named z1, z2, and z3), each automatically given anchors with these names. The user then saves and closes the document. NeXT would then add, within the header of the HTML document, a special tag, <NEXTID N="z8">, to inform where to continue its naming convention. Imagine the web author opens the document for further editing. They want to add a couple new sections after the second section, appending four more sections at the end. When opening the document, the NeXT editor finds and reads this <NEXTID N="z8"> tag, and now knows to give the first of these new sections the name of z8 in the Table of Contents, and z14 to the content body. This might look like this:
trans-unit.target: 用户在目录中输入四个部分标题（并且大概也在这些部分中编写段落材料）。四个部分中每个部分的标题将被分配名称值“ z0”，“ z1”，“ z2”和“ z3”。其中第一个将在目录中产生如下条目： <A NAME="z0" HREF="#z4">FIRST SECTION NAME</A> ，并且节标题将被标记为： <H2><A NAME="z4">FIRST SECTION NAME</A></H2> 。接下来的三个部分z5，z6和z7（以及名为z1，z2和z3的目录条目）将继续这三个部分，每个部分都会自动使用这些名称来指定锚点。然后，用户保存并关闭文档。然后NeXT将添加在HTML文档的标题中，有一个特殊标记 <NEXTID N="z8"> ，以告知在何处继续其命名约定。想象一下，网络作者打开了文档进行进一步编辑。他们想在第二部分之后添加几个新的部分，在末尾再添加四个部分。打开文档时，NeXT编辑器会找到并读取此 <NEXTID N="z8"> 标记，现在知道将这些新节的第一个命名为目录中的z8，并将z14命名为内容主体。可能看起来像这样：

The value of the title attribute is usually presented to the user as a tooltip, which appears shortly after the cursor stops moving over the image. While this can provide additional information to the user, you should not assume that the user will ever see it: the user may only have keyboard or touchscreen. If you have information that's particularly important or valuable for the user, present it inline using one of the methods mentioned above instead of using title.

The value of the hue (H) component of an HSL color is an angle from red around through yellow, green, cyan, blue, and magenta (ending up back at red again at 360°) that identifies what the base color is. The value can be specified in any <angle> unit supported by CSS, including degrees (deg), radians (rad), gradians (grad), or turns (turn). But this doesn't control how vivid or dull, or how bright or dark the color is.
trans-unit.target: HSL颜色的色相（H）分量的值是从红色到黄色，绿色，青色，蓝色和洋红色（在360°处再次返回红色）之间的角度，该角度确定了基色是什么。可以在CSS支持的任何 <angle> 单位中指定该值，包括度（ deg ），弧度（ rad ），刻度（ grad ）或转弯（ turn ）。但这并不能控制颜色的鲜艳度或暗淡程度，或颜色的明暗程度。

trans-unit.source: The value of this attribute provides information about the functions that might be performed on an object. The values generally are given by the HTTP protocol when it is used, but it might (for similar reasons as for the title attribute) be useful to include advisory information in advance in the link. For example, the browser might choose a different rendering of a link as a function of the methods specified; something that is searchable might get a different icon, or an outside link might render with an indication of leaving the current site. This attribute is not well understood nor supported, even by the defining browser, Internet Explorer 4.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值提供有关可能在对象上执行的功能的信息。这些值通常在使用时由HTTP协议给定，但是（由于与title属性类似的原因）在链接中预先包含咨询信息可能会很有用。例如，浏览器可能根据指定的方法选择不同的链接呈现方式。可搜索的内容可能会得到其他图标，或者外部链接可能会显示离开当前站点的指示。即使定义的浏览器Internet Explorer 4也无法很好地理解或支持此属性。

The week of the year is a two-digit string between 01 and 53. Each week begins on Monday and ends on Sunday. That means it's possible for the first few days of January to be considered part of the previous week-year, and for the last few days of December to be considered part of the following week-year. The first week of the year is the week that conains the first Thursday of the year. For example, the first Thursday of 1953 was on January 1, so that week—beginning on Monday, December 29—is considered the first week of the year. Therefore, December 30, 1952 occurs during the week 1953-W01.
The week values are dynamically generated by the JavaScript code below.

There are many situations in which your web site may need to let the user select a color. Perhaps you have a customizable user interface, or you're implementing a drawing app. Maybe you have editable text and need to let the user choose the text color. Or perhaps your app lets the user assign colors to folders or items. Although historically it's been necessary to implement your own color picker, HTML now provides support for browsers to provide one for your use through the <input> element, by using "color" as the value of its type attribute.
trans-unit.target: 在许多情况下，您的网站可能需要让用户选择一种颜色。也许您具有可自定义的用户界面，或者您正在实现绘图应用程序。也许您有可编辑的文本，并且需要让用户选择文本颜色。也许您的应用允许用户为文件夹或项目分配颜色。尽管历史上有必要实现自己的颜色选择器，但HTML现在支持浏览器通过使用 "color" 作为其 type 属性的值，通过 <input> 元素为您提供一种使用。

There are no special styling considerations for <label> elements — structurally they are simple inline elements, and so can be styled in much the same way as a <span> or <a> element. You can apply styling to them in any way you want, as long as you don't cause the text to become difficult to read.
trans-unit.target: <label> 元素没有特殊的样式注意事项-从结构上讲，它们是简单的嵌入式元素，因此可以使用与 <span> 或 <a> 元素几乎相同的方式进行样式设置。只要不使文本难以阅读，就可以以任何方式对它们应用样式。

trans-unit.source: There are not many use cases for this property. The most common is when a checkbox is available that "owns" a number of sub-options (which are also checkboxes). If all of the sub-options are checked, the owning checkbox is also checked, and if they're all unchecked, the owning checkbox is unchecked. If any one or more of the sub-options have a different state than the others, the owning checkbox is in the indeterminate state.
trans-unit.target: 这个属性的用例不多。最常见的是当一个复选框 "拥有 "许多子选项(它们也是复选框)时。如果所有的子选项都被选中,则拥有的复选框也被选中,如果它们都没有被选中,则拥有的复选框没有被选中。如果任何一个或多个子选项的状态与其他选项不同,则拥有复选框处于不确定状态。

trans-unit.source: There are now three modes used by the layout engines in web browsers: quirks mode, almost standards mode, and full standards mode. In quirks mode, layout emulates nonstandard behavior in Navigator 4 and Internet Explorer 5. This is essential in order to support websites that were built before the widespread adoption of web standards. In full standards mode, the behavior is (hopefully) the behavior described by the HTML and CSS specifications. In almost standards mode, there are only a very small number of quirks implemented.
trans-unit.target: Web浏览器中的布局引擎现在使用三种模式：怪癖模式，几乎标准模式和全标准模式。在怪癖模式下，布局模仿Navigator 4和Internet Explorer 5中的非标准行为。这对于支持在广泛采用Web标准之前建立的网站来说是必不可少的。在完全标准模式下，行为是（希望）是HTML和CSS规范描述的行为。在几乎标准模式下，仅实现了极少数的怪癖。

So it's important to consider your use of color carefully.

trans-unit.target: 这些元素可以让你提供文本中特定部分被修改的指示。

trans-unit.source: These elements only include the global attributes.
These examples demonstrate how different attributes of the <source> element change the selection of the image inside <picture>.
trans-unit.target: 这些示例演示了 <source> 元素的不同属性如何改变 <picture> 内部图像的选择。

trans-unit.source: These examples show how to import (an external) script using the <script> element.
These examples show how to import script using the <script> element in both HTML4 and HTML5.
trans-unit.target: 这些示例说明如何在HTML4和HTML5中使用 <script> 元素导入脚本。

trans-unit.source: These let you color the edges of the border closest to to the beginning and the end of the start of lines of text within the box. Which side this is will vary depending on the writing-mode, direction, and text-orientation properties, which are typically (but not always) used to adjust text directionality based on the language being displayed. For example, if the box's text is being rendered right-to-left, then the border-inline-start-color is applied to the right side of the border.
trans-unit.target: 这些使您可以为最接近框内文本行的开头和结尾的边框上色。这是哪一侧会有所不同，具体取决于 writing-mode ， direction 和 text-orientation 属性，这些属性通常（但并非总是）用于根据所显示的语言来调整文本方向性。例如，如果框的文本是从右到左呈现的，则 border-inline-start-color 将应用于边框的右侧。

trans-unit.source: These values cause unexpected behavior when copying/dragging links, opening links in a new tab/window, bookmarking, and when JavaScript is still downloading, errors out, or is disabled. This also conveys incorrect semantics to assistive technologies (e.g., screen readers). In these cases, it is recommended to use a <button> instead. In general you should only use an anchor for navigation using a proper URL.
trans-unit.target: 当复制/拖动链接，在新标签页/窗口中打开链接，添加书签以及JavaScript仍在下载，错误输出或被禁用时，这些值会导致意外行为。这也将不正确的语义传达给辅助技术（例如，屏幕阅读器）。在这些情况下，建议改用 <button> 。通常，您只应使用锚来使用正确的URL进行导航。

trans-unit.source: They are called radio buttons because they look and operate in a similar manner to the push buttons on old-fashioned radios, such as the one shown below.
trans-unit.target: 它们被称为无线电按钮,因为它们的外观和操作方式类似于老式收音机上的按钮,比如下图所示。

trans-unit.source: They then forward a copy of this document to someone with a NeXT editor, and they delete sections z7 and z19, add ten more, z20 through z29, and then delete paragraphs z24 and z29. So then the NEXTID value is z30 when it's returned modified:
trans-unit.target: 然后他们把这个文档的副本转发给有NeXT编辑器的人,他们删除z7和z19节,再增加十节,z20到z29,然后删除z24和z29段。那么当返回修改后,NEXTID值就是z30。

trans-unit.source: Thing
trans-unit.target: Thing

trans-unit.source: Things that can have color
trans-unit.target: 可以有颜色的东西

trans-unit.source: Think of a template as a content fragment that is being stored for subsequent use in the document. While the parser does process the contents of the <template>element while loading the page, it does so only to ensure that those contents are valid; the element's contents are not rendered, however.
trans-unit.target: 可以将模板视为存储在文档中以供后续使用的内容片段。尽管解析器在加载页面时确实处理了 <template> 元素的内容，但这样做只是为了确保这些内容有效。但是，不会呈现元素的内容。

trans-unit.source: Think of it like creating the perfect paint color:
trans-unit.target: 就像创造完美的油漆颜色一样。

trans-unit.source: Thinly-sliced apples: 6 cups
trans-unit.target: 切成薄片的苹果。6杯

trans-unit.source: This HTML reference describes all elements and attributes of HTML, including global attributes that apply to all elements.
trans-unit.target: 该HTML参考描述了HTML的所有元素和属性，包括适用于所有元素的全局属性。

trans-unit.source: This <meta> element is only one part of the algorithm to determine a page's character set. The Content-Type header and any Byte-Order Marks override this element.
trans-unit.target: 此 <meta> 元素只是确定页面字符集的算法的一部分。该 Content-Type 的头部和任何字节顺序标记覆盖此元素。

trans-unit.source: This Boolean attribute hints that the list should be rendered in a compact style. The interpretation of this attribute depends on the user agent, and it doesn't work in all browsers.
This Boolean attribute hints that the list should be rendered in a compact style. The interpretation of this attribute depends on the user agent and it doesn't work in all browsers.
trans-unit.target: 这个布尔属性提示列表应该以紧凑的样式呈现。这个属性的解释取决于用户代理,并不是所有的浏览器都适用。

trans-unit.source: This Boolean attribute indicates if the type attribute and the actual content type of the resource must match to be used.
trans-unit.target: 该布尔属性指示是否必须匹配资源的类型属性和实际内容类型才能使用。

trans-unit.source: This Boolean attribute indicates that multiple options can be selected in the list. If it is not specified, then only one option can be selected at a time. When multiple is specified, most browsers will show a scrolling list box instead of a single line dropdown.
trans-unit.target: 此布尔值属性指示可以在列表中选择多个选项。如果未指定，则一次只能选择一个选项。当 multiple 指定的，大多数浏览器会显示滚动列表框，而不是一个单一的线下拉。

trans-unit.source: This Boolean attribute indicates that the form control is not available for interaction.
trans-unit.target: 这个布尔属性表示表单控件不可用于交互。

trans-unit.source: This Boolean attribute indicates that the form is not to be validated when submitted. If this attribute is not specified (and therefore the form is validated), this default setting can be overridden by a formnovalidate attribute on a <button> or <input> element belonging to the form.
trans-unit.target: 此布尔值属性指示在提交表单时不对其进行验证。如果未指定此属性（并因此验证了表单），则可以通过属于该表单的 <button> 或 <input> 元素上的 formnovalidate 属性来覆盖此默认设置。

trans-unit.source: This Boolean attribute indicates that the form shouldn't be validated when submitted. If this attribute is not set (and therefore the form is validated), it can be overridden by a formnovalidate attribute on a <button>, <input type="submit">, or <input type="image"> element belonging to the form.
This Boolean attribute indicates that the image is part of a server-side map. If so, the coordinates where the user clicked on the image are sent to the server.
This Boolean attribute indicates that the image is part of a server-side map. If so, the precise coordinates of a click are sent to the server.
trans-unit.target: 这个布尔属性表示图像是服务器端地图的一部分。如果是,点击的精确坐标会被发送到服务器。

trans-unit.source: This Boolean attribute indicates that the password field is not available for interaction. Additionally, disabled field values aren't submitted with the form.
trans-unit.target: 这个布尔属性表示密码字段不可用于交互。此外,禁用的字段值不会与表单一起提交。

trans-unit.source: This Boolean attribute indicates that the user cannot interact with the button. If this attribute is not specified, the button inherits its setting from the containing element, for example <fieldset>; if there is no containing element with the disabled attribute set, then the button is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 此布尔值属性指示用户无法与按钮交互。如果未指定此属性，则按钮从包含元素（例如 <fieldset> )继承其设置。如果没有包含禁用属性集的包含元素，则启用按钮。

trans-unit.source: This Boolean attribute indicates that the user cannot interact with the control. If this attribute is not specified, the control inherits its setting from the containing element, for example <fieldset>; if there is no containing element when the disabled attribute is set, the control is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 此布尔值属性指示用户无法与控件进行交互。如果未指定此属性，则控件从包含元素（例如 <fieldset> )继承其设置。如果在设置了 disabled 属性时没有包含元素，则启用控件。

trans-unit.source: This Boolean attribute indicates that the user cannot interact with the control. If this attribute is not specified, the control inherits its setting from the containing element, for example <fieldset>; if there is no containing element with the disabled attribute set, then the control is enabled.

This Boolean attribute indicates that the user cannot interact with the control. If this attribute is not specified, the control inherits its setting from the containing element, for example fieldset; if there is no containing element with the disabled attribute set, then the control is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 此布尔值属性指示用户无法与控件进行交互。如果未指定此属性，则控件从包含元素（例如 fieldset )继承其设置。如果没有包含 disabled 属性集的包含元素，则启用控件。

trans-unit.source: This Boolean attribute indicates that the user cannot modify the value of the control. Unlike the disabled attribute, the readonly attribute does not prevent the user from clicking or selecting in the control. The value of a read-only control is still submitted with the form.
trans-unit.target: 此布尔值属性指示用户无法修改控件的值。与 disabled 属性不同， readonly 属性不会阻止用户单击或选择控件。只读控件的值仍与表单一起提交。

trans-unit.source: This Boolean attribute indicates use of the same command as the menu's subject element (such as a button or input).
trans-unit.target: 此布尔值属性指示使用与菜单的subject元素（例如 button 或 input ）相同的命令。

trans-unit.source: This Boolean attribute indicates whether or not the details — that is, the contents of the <details> element — are currently visible. The default, false, means the details are not visible.
trans-unit.target: 此布尔值属性指示详细信息（即 <details> 元素的内容）当前是否可见。默认 false ，表示看不到详细信息。

trans-unit.source: This Boolean attribute is set to indicate that the script should not be executed in browsers that support ES2015 modules — in effect, this can be used to serve fallback scripts to older browsers that do not support modular JavaScript code.
trans-unit.target: 设置此布尔值属性是为了指示该脚本不应在支持ES2015模块的浏览器中执行-实际上，该属性可用于向不支持模块化JavaScript代码的旧版浏览器提供后备脚本。

trans-unit.source: This Boolean attribute is set to indicate to a browser that the script is meant to be executed after the document has been parsed, but before firing DOMContentLoaded.
trans-unit.target: 设置此布尔值属性是为了向浏览器指示脚本应在解析文档之后但在触发 DOMContentLoaded 之前执行。

trans-unit.source: This Boolean attribute lets you specify that a form control should have input focus when the page loads. Only one form element in a document can have the autofocus attribute.
trans-unit.target: 使用此布尔属性，可以指定页面加载时表单控件应具有输入焦点。文档中只有一个表单元素可以具有 autofocus 属性。

trans-unit.source: This Boolean attribute lets you specify that a form control should have input focus when the page loads. Only one form-associated element in a document can have this attribute specified.
trans-unit.target: 这个布尔属性可以让你指定表单控件在页面加载时应该有输入焦点。在一个文档中,只能指定一个与表单相关的元素。

trans-unit.source: This Boolean attribute lets you specify that the button should have input focus when the page loads, unless the user overrides it, for example by typing in a different control. Only one form-associated element in a document can have this attribute specified.
trans-unit.target: 这个布尔属性可以让你指定按钮在页面加载时应该有输入焦点,除非用户覆盖它,例如输入不同的控件。在一个文档中只能指定一个与表单相关的元素。

trans-unit.source: This Boolean attribute lets you specify that the control should have input focus when the page loads, unless the user overrides it, for example by typing in a different control. Only one form element in a document can have the autofocus attribute, which is a Boolean.
trans-unit.target: 使用此布尔属性，可以指定页面加载时控件应具有输入焦点，除非用户覆盖它，例如通过键入其他控件。文档中只有一个表单元素可以具有 autofocus 属性，该属性是布尔值。

trans-unit.source: This Boolean attribute prevents the user from interacting with the button. If this attribute isn't set, the button can still be disabled from a containing element, for example <fieldset>; if there is no containing element with the disabled attribute set, then the button is enabled.
This Boolean attribute prevents the user from interacting with the button: it cannot be pressed or focused.
This Boolean attribute specifies that the button should have input focus when the page loads. Only one element in a document can have this attribute.
This Boolean attribute specifies that the items of the list are specified in reversed order.
trans-unit.target: 这个布尔属性指定列表中的项目是以相反的顺序指定的。

trans-unit.source: This Boolean attribute specifies that the list’s items are in reverse order. Items will be numbered from high to low.

This Boolean disabled attribute indicates that the user cannot interact with the control or its descendant controls. If this attribute is not specified, the control inherits its setting from the containing element, for example fieldset; if there is no containing element with the disabled attribute set, and the control itself does not have the attribute, then the control is enabled. If declared on an <optgroup>, the select is still interactive (unless otherwise disabled), but none of the items in the option group are selectable.
This CSS creates a look similar to a tab interface, where activating the tab expands and opens it to reveal its contents.
trans-unit.target: 这个CSS创建了一个类似于tab界面的外观,激活tab可以展开并打开tab以显示其内容。

trans-unit.source: This CSS creates a look similar to a tabbed interface, where activating the tab expands and opens it to reveal its contents.
This CSS creates a look similar to a tabbed interface, where clicking the tab opens it to reveal its contents.
trans-unit.target: 这个CSS创建了一个类似于tabbed界面的外观,点击tab可以打开它,显示它的内容。

trans-unit.source: This CSS indicates that when the <u> element is styled with the class "spelling", it should have a red wavy underline underneath its text. This is a common styling for spelling errors. Another common style can be presented using "red dashed underline".
trans-unit.target: 该CSS表示 <u> 元素使用 "spelling" 类设置样式时，其文本下方应具有红色的波浪下划线。这是拼写错误的常见样式。可以使用 "red dashed underline" 表示另一种常见样式。

trans-unit.source: This CSS indicates that when the <u> element is styled with the class spelling, it should have a red wavy underline underneath its text. This is a common styling for spelling errors. Another common style can be presented using red dashed underline.

This HTML demonstrates the most basic structure of a table. There are no groups, no cells that span multiple rows or columns, no captions, and only the most basic styling to create lines around the components of the table for something resembling clarity.
trans-unit.target: 这个HTML展示了一个表格的最基本结构。这里没有分组,没有跨越多行或多列的单元格,没有标题,只有最基本的样式,在表格的组件周围创建线条,以达到类似于清晰的效果。

trans-unit.source: This HTML submits the entered date under the key bday to https://example.com — resulting in a URL like https://example.com/?bday=1955-06-08.
This HTML uses <var> to enclose the names of two variables.
trans-unit.target: 该HTML使用 <var> 来包含两个变量的名称。

trans-unit.source: This Mozilla-specific extension is a string which Firefox displays instead of the default error message when the field fails to validate.
trans-unit.target: 这个Mozilla特有的扩展是一个字符串,当字段无法验证时,Firefox会显示这个字符串来代替默认的错误信息。

trans-unit.source: This allows for bookmarking a single article in a page containing multiple articles, such as on a monthly summary blog page, or a blog aggregator.
trans-unit.target: 这样就可以在一个包含多篇文章的页面中加入单篇文章的书签,比如在每月总结的博客页面,或者博客聚合器上。

trans-unit.source: This article covers most of the ways you use CSS to add color to HTML content, listing what parts of HTML documents can be colored and what CSS properties to use when doing so. Includes examples, links to palette-building tools, and more.
trans-unit.target: 本文涵盖了使用CSS为HTML内容添加颜色的大部分方法,列举了HTML文档中哪些部分可以着色,以及在着色时应该使用哪些CSS属性。包括示例、调色板构建工具的链接等。

trans-unit.source: This article describes several text-level elements. It explains their usage in an HTML document.
trans-unit.target: 本文介绍了几个文本级元素。它解释了它们在HTML文档中的用法。

trans-unit.source: This article provides a basic guide to how <link rel="preload"> works.
This attribute added its value as a prompt for text field.
This attribute adds its value as a prompt for text field.
trans-unit.target: 此属性将其值添加为文本字段的提示。

trans-unit.source: This attribute allows the elimination of parser-blocking JavaScript where the browser would have to load and evaluate scripts before continuing to parse. async has a similar effect in this case.
This attribute allows the elimination of parser-blocking JavaScript where the browser would have to load and evaluate scripts before continuing to parse. defer has a similar effect in this case.
This attribute allows you to specify a frame’s border.
trans-unit.target: 此属性使您可以指定框架的边框。

trans-unit.source: This attribute assigns a name to the applet so that it can be identified by other resources; particularly scripts.
trans-unit.target: 这个属性为小程序指定了一个名称,这样它就可以被其他资源识别,特别是脚本。

trans-unit.source: This attribute associates the element with a form element that has ownership of the meter element. For example, a meter might be displaying a range corresponding to an input element of typenumber. This attribute is only used if the meter element is being used as a form-associated element; even then, it may be omitted if the element appears as a descendant of a form element.
trans-unit.target: 此属性将元素与具有 meter 元素所有权的 form 元素相关联。例如， meter 可能正在显示与 type number的 input 元素相对应的范围。仅当 meter 元素用作与表单相关的元素时，才使用此属性。即使该元素出现在 form 元素的后代中，也可以省略。

trans-unit.source: This attribute can be overridden by the CSS properties direction and unicode-bidi, if a CSS page is active and the element supports these properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果CSS页面处于活动状态，并且元素支持这些属性，则CSS属性 direction 和 unicode-bidi 可以覆盖此属性。

trans-unit.source: This attribute can be set to true if the contents of a cross-origin <iframe> should be allowed to invoke the Payment Request API.
trans-unit.target: 如果允许跨域 <iframe> 的内容来调用Payment Request API，则可以将此属性设置为 true 。

trans-unit.source: This attribute can be set to true if the frame is allowed to be placed into full screen mode by calling its requestFullscreen() method.
trans-unit.target: 如果允许通过调用框架的 requestFullscreen() 方法将其置于全屏模式，则可以将此属性设置为 true 。

trans-unit.source: This attribute can be used to send the query to a different URL. Action is not defined by W3C.
trans-unit.target: 这个属性可以用来将查询发送到不同的URL。W3C没有定义Action。

trans-unit.source: This attribute can only be used if the specified custom element name has been successfully defined in the current document, and extends the element type it is being applied to.
trans-unit.target: 仅当在当前文档中成功定义了指定的自定义元素名称并扩展了要应用的元素类型时，才能使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: This attribute causes a descriptive text alternate to be displayed on browsers that do not support Java. Page designers should also remember that content enclosed within the <applet> element may also be rendered as alternative text.
trans-unit.target: 此属性导致在不支持Java的浏览器上显示替代文字。页面设计人员还应该记住， <applet> 元素内包含的内容也可以呈现为替代文本。

trans-unit.source: This attribute contains a comma-separated list of one or more font names. The document text in the default style is rendered in the first font face that the client's browser supports. If no font listed is installed on the local system, the browser typically defaults to the proportional or fixed-width font for that system.
trans-unit.target: 此属性包含一个或多个以逗号分隔的字体名称列表。默认样式的文档文本将以客户端浏览器支持的第一种字体呈现。如果本地系统上没有安装列出的字体,浏览器通常会默认使用该系统的比例字体或固定宽度字体。

trans-unit.source: This attribute contains a list of one or more font names. The document text in the default style is rendered in the first font face that the client's browser supports. If no font listed is installed on the local system, the browser typically defaults to the proportional or fixed-width font for that system.
trans-unit.target: 此属性包含一个或多个字体名称的列表。默认样式的文档文本将以客户端浏览器支持的第一种字体呈现。如果本地系统上没有安装列出的字体,浏览器通常会默认使用该系统的比例字体或固定宽度字体。

trans-unit.source: This attribute contains a list of space-separated strings, each corresponding to the id attribute of the <th> elements that apply to this element.
trans-unit.target: 此属性包含以空格分隔的字符串的列表，每个字符串都与应用于该元素的 <th> 元素的id属性相对应。

trans-unit.source: This attribute contains a list of space-separated strings. Each string is the id of a group of cells that this header applies to.
trans-unit.target: 此属性包含以空格分隔的字符串的列表。每个字符串是此标头适用的一组单元格的 id 。

trans-unit.source: This attribute contains a non-negative integer value that indicates for how many columns the cell extends. Its default value is 1. Values higher than 1000 will be considered as incorrect and will be set to the default value (1).
trans-unit.target: 此属性包含一个非负整数值，该整数值指示单元格可以扩展多少列。其默认值为 1 。大于1000的值将被视为不正确，并将被设置为默认值（1）。

trans-unit.source: This attribute contains a non-negative integer value that indicates for how many rows the cell extends. Its default value is 1; if its value is set to 0, it extends until the end of the table section (<thead>, <tbody>, <tfoot>, even if implicitly defined), that the cell belongs to. Values higher than 65534 are clipped down to 65534.
trans-unit.target: 此属性包含一个非负整数值，该整数值指示单元格可以扩展多少行。其默认值为 1 ; 如果其值设置为 0 ，则它将一直延伸到该单元格所属的表部分的末尾（ <thead> ， <tbody> ， <tfoot> ，即使隐式定义）。高于65534的值将缩减为65534。

trans-unit.source: This attribute contains a non-negative integer value that indicates for how many rows the cell extends. Its default value is 1; if its value is set to 0, it extends until the end of the table section (<thead>, <tbody>, <tfoot>, even if implicitly defined, that the cell belongs to. Values higher than 65534 are clipped down to 65534.
trans-unit.target: 此属性包含一个非负整数值，该整数值指示单元格可以扩展多少行。其默认值为 1 ; 如果其值设置为 0 ，则它将一直扩展到表部分的末尾（ <thead> ， <tbody> ， <tfoot> ，即使隐式定义了该单元格所属的位置。大于65534的值也会被缩减为65534 。

trans-unit.source: This attribute contains a positive integer indicating the number of consecutive columns the <col> element spans. If not present, its default value is 1.
trans-unit.target: 此属性包含一个正整数，指示 <col> 元素跨越的连续列数。如果不存在，则其默认值为 1 。

trans-unit.source: This attribute contains a positive integer indicating the number of consecutive columns the <colgroup> element spans. If not present, its default value is 1.
trans-unit.target: 此属性包含一个正整数，指示 <colgroup> 元素跨越的连续列数。如果不存在，则其默认值为 1 。

trans-unit.source: This attribute contains a short abbreviated description of the cell's content. Some user-agents, such as speech readers, may present this description before the content itself.
trans-unit.target: 此属性包含单元格内容的简短描述。一些用户代理,如语音阅读器,可能会在内容本身之前显示这一描述。

trans-unit.source: This attribute contains inline metadata that a user agent can use to verify that a fetched resource has been delivered free of unexpected manipulation. See Subresource Integrity.
trans-unit.target: 该属性包含内联元数据，用户代理可使用这些内联元数据来验证获取的资源是否已交付而没有意外的操作。请参阅子资源完整性。

trans-unit.source: This attribute contains the value for the http-equiv or name attribute, depending on which is used.
trans-unit.target: 此属性包含 http-equiv 或 name 属性的值，具体取决于所使用的属性。

trans-unit.source: This attribute declares the document's character encoding. If the attribute is present, its value must be an ASCII case-insensitive match for the string "utf-8", because UTF-8 is the only valid encoding for HTML5 documents. meta elements which declare a character encoding must be located entirely within the first 1024 bytes of the document.
This attribute declares the page's character encoding. It must contain a standard IANA MIME name for character encodings. Although the standard doesn't request a specific encoding, it suggests:
trans-unit.target: 此属性声明页面的字符编码。它必须包含用于字符编码的标准IANA MIME名称。尽管该标准不要求特定的编码，但它建议：

trans-unit.source: This attribute defined the character encoding of the linked URL. The value should be a space- and/or comma-delimited list of character sets defined in RFC 2045. The default value is ISO-8859-1.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了链接URL 的字符编码。该值应该是RFC 2045中定义的字符集的空格和/或逗号分隔列表。默认值为 ISO-8859-1 。

trans-unit.source: This attribute defines a number between -10,000 and +10,000 that determines how the volume will be divided between the speakers.
trans-unit.target: 该属性定义了一个介于-10,000和+10,000之间的数字,决定了扬声器之间的音量分配方式。

trans-unit.source: This attribute defines a number between -10,000 and 0 that determines the loudness of a page's background sound.
trans-unit.target: 这个属性定义了一个介于-10,000和0之间的数字,决定了页面背景声音的响度。

trans-unit.source: This attribute defines an alternative text description of the image.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了图像的备选文本描述。

trans-unit.source: This attribute defines an alternative text that summarizes the content of the table. Typically, it allows visually impaired people who are browsing the web with a Braille screen, to acquire information about the table. If the information added by this attribute is also useful to people who are not visually impaired, consider using the <caption> instead. The summary attribute is not mandatory and may be omitted when a <caption> element fulfills its role.
trans-unit.target: 该属性定义了替代性的文本，该文本总结了表的内容。通常，它允许使用盲文屏幕浏览视觉障碍的人获取有关表格的信息。如果此属性添加的信息对视力不佳的人也有用，请考虑改用 <caption> 。summary属性不是强制性的，当 <caption> 元素履行其职责时可以将其省略。

trans-unit.source: This attribute defines an alternative text that summarizes the content of the table. Use the <caption> element instead.
This attribute defines the URI of a resource that explains the change, such as a link to meeting minutes or a ticket in a troubleshooting system.
This attribute defines the URI of a resource that explains the change, such as a link to meeting minutes or a ticket in a troubleshooting sytem.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了解释更改的资源的URI,例如指向会议记录的链接或故障排除系统中的票据。

trans-unit.source: This attribute defines the background color of a table. It consists of a 6-digit hexadecimal code as defined in sRGB and is prefixed by '#'. This attribute may be used with one of sixteen predefined color strings:
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义表格的背景色。它由sRGB中定义的6位十六进制代码组成，并以“＃”作为前缀。此属性可以与16个预定义的颜色字符串之一一起使用：

trans-unit.source: This attribute defines the background color of each cell in a column. It consists of a 6-digit hexadecimal code as defined in sRGB and is prefixed by '#'. This attribute may be used with one of sixteen predefined color strings:
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义列中每个单元格的背景色。它由sRGB中定义的6位十六进制代码组成，并以“＃”作为前缀。该属性可以与16个预定义的颜色字符串之一一起使用：

trans-unit.source: This attribute defines the background color of each cell in a column. It is a 6-digit hexadecimal RGB code, prefixed by a '#'. One of the predefined color kewords can also be used.

This attribute defines the background color of each cell of the column. It is one of the 6-digit hexadecimal code as defined in sRGB, prefixed by a '#'. One of the sixteen predefined color strings may be used:
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义列的每个单元格的背景色。它是sRGB中定义的6位十六进制代码之一，前缀为“＃”。可以使用十六个预定义的颜色字符串之一：

trans-unit.source: This attribute defines the background color of each cell of the columns member of the column group. It is one of the 6-digit hexadecimal code as defined in sRGB, prefixed by a '#'. One of the sixteen predefined color strings, as mentioned below, may be used:
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义列组的成员列的每个单元格的背景色。它是sRGB中定义的6位十六进制代码之一，前缀为“＃”。如下所述，可以使用十六种预定义的颜色字符串之一：

trans-unit.source: This attribute defines the character encoding of the linked resource. The value is a space- and/or comma-delimited list of character sets as defined in RFC 2045. The default value is iso-8859-1.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义链接资源的字符编码。该值是RFC 2045中定义的字符集的空格和/或逗号分隔列表。缺省值为 iso-8859-1 。

trans-unit.source: This attribute defines the existence of a scrollbar. If this attribute is not used, the browser adds a scrollbar when necessary. There are two choices: "yes" for forcing a scrollbar even when it is not necessary and "no" for forcing no scrollbar even when it is necessary.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义滚动条的存在。如果未使用此属性，则浏览器将在必要时添加滚动条。有两种选择：“是”强制滚动条，即使它是没有必要的，“不”强迫没有滚动条，即使它是必要的。

trans-unit.source: This attribute defines the height of the margin between frames.
trans-unit.target: 该属性定义了帧与帧之间的边距高度。

trans-unit.source: This attribute defines the name of a piece of document-level metadata. It should not be set if one of the attributes itemprop, http-equiv or charset is also set.
trans-unit.target: 该属性定义了一段文档级元数据的名称。如果还设置了属性 itemprop ， http-equiv 或 charset 之一，则不应设置该属性。

trans-unit.source: This attribute defines the scheme in which metadata is described. A scheme is a context leading to the correct interpretations of the content value, like a format.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义描述元数据的方案。方案是导致正确解释 content 值（如格式）的上下文。

trans-unit.source: This attribute defines the size of the space between two cells in a percentage value or pixels. The attribute is applied both horizontally and vertically, to the space between the top of the table and the cells of the first row, the left of the table and the first column, the right of the table and the last column and the bottom of the table and the last row.
trans-unit.target: 该属性以百分比值或像素定义两个单元格之间的空间大小。该属性既适用于水平方向,也适用于垂直方向,适用于表格顶部与第一行单元格、表格左侧与第一列、表格右侧与最后一列以及表格底部与最后一行之间的空间。

trans-unit.source: This attribute defines the sizes of the icons for visual media contained in the resource. It must be present only if the rel contains a value of icon or a non-standard type such as Apple's apple-touch-icon. It may have the following values:
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义资源中包含的视觉媒体的图标大小。仅当 rel 包含 icon 的值或非标准类型（例如Apple的 apple-touch-icon )时,它才必须存在。它可能具有以下值：

trans-unit.source: This attribute defines the space between the content of a cell and its border, displayed or not. If the cellpadding's length is defined in pixels, this pixel-sized space will be applied to all four sides of the cell's content. If the length is defined using a percentage value, the content will be centered and the total vertical space (top and bottom) will represent this value. The same is true for the total horizontal space (left and right).
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了单元格内容与其边框之间的空间,无论是否显示。如果celllpadding的长度是以像素为单位定义的,那么这个像素大小的空间将被应用到单元格内容的所有四边。如果长度用百分比值定义,则内容将居中,总的垂直空间(顶部和底部)将代表这个值。总的水平空间(左和右)也是如此。

trans-unit.source: This attribute defines the styling language as a MIME type (charset should not be specified). This attribute is optional and defaults to text/css if it is not specified — there is very little reason to include this in modern web documents.
trans-unit.target: 此属性将样式语言定义为MIME类型（不应指定字符集）。此属性是可选的，如果未指定，则默认为 text/css ，几乎没有理由在现代Web文档中包含此属性。

trans-unit.source: This attribute defines the styling language as a MIME type (charset should not be specified). This attribute is optional and defaults to text/css if it is not specified; values other than the empty string or text/css are not used. Note: There is very little reason to include this attribute in modern web documents.
This attribute defines the width of the margin between frames.
trans-unit.target: 该属性定义了帧与帧之间的边距宽度。

trans-unit.source: This attribute defines the width of the table. The width may be defined by pixels or a percentage value. A percentage value will be defined by the width of the container in which the table is placed.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了表格的宽度。宽度可以用像素或百分比值来定义。百分比值由放置表格的容器的宽度来定义。

trans-unit.source: This attribute defines the width of the table. Use the CSS width property instead.
This attribute defines which media the style should be applied to. Its value is a media query, which defaults to all if the attribute is missing.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义应将样式应用于哪种媒体。它的值是一个媒体查询，如果缺少该属性，则默认为 all 。

trans-unit.source: This attribute describes how much work the task indicated by the progress element requires. The max attribute, if present, must have a value greater than 0 and be a valid floating point number. The default value is 1.

This attribute describes how much work the task indicated by the progress element requires. The max attribute, if present, must have a value greater than zero and be a valid floating point number. The default value is 1.
trans-unit.target: 此属性描述了 progress 元素指示的任务需要进行多少工作。的 max 属性，如果存在的话，必须有一个值大于零，是一个有效的浮点数。预设值是1。

trans-unit.source: This attribute determined the server URL to which the query was sent.
This attribute gives the absolute or relative URL of the directory where applets' .class files referenced by the code attribute are stored.
trans-unit.target: 这个属性给出了存放由代码属性引用的applet的.class文件的目录的绝对或相对URL。

trans-unit.source: This attribute gives the name of the group of commands, with a type of radio, that will be toggled when the command itself is toggled. This attribute must be omitted unless the type attribute is radio.
trans-unit.target: 该属性提供命令组的名称，用 type 的 radio ，当命令本身被切换将被切换。除非 type 属性是 radio ,否则必须省略此属性。

trans-unit.source: This attribute has no effect on input types that do not return numeric or text data, such as checkbox or image.
trans-unit.target: 此属性对不返回数字或文本数据的输入类型（如 checkbox 或 image )无效。

trans-unit.source: This attribute identifies a resource that might be required by the next navigation and that the user agent should retrieve it. This allows the user agent to respond faster when the resource is requested in the future.
trans-unit.target: 该属性标识了下一次导航可能需要的资源,用户代理应该检索该资源。这使用户代理能够在未来请求资源时更快地做出反应。

trans-unit.source: This attribute indicates that the form shouldn't be validated when submitted.
trans-unit.target: 这个属性表示在提交表单时不应该进行验证。

trans-unit.source: This attribute indicates that the track should be enabled unless the user's preferences indicate that another track is more appropriate. This may only be used on one track element per media element.
trans-unit.target: 该属性指示应该启用该轨道，除非用户的首选项指示另一个轨道更合适。每个媒体元素只能在一个 track 元素上使用。

trans-unit.source: This attribute indicates the human language of the linked resource. It is purely advisory, with no built-in functionality. Allowed values are determined by BCP47.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指示链接资源的人工语言。它纯粹是建议性的，没有内置功能。允许值由BCP47确定。

trans-unit.source: This attribute indicates the kind of command, and can be one of three values.
trans-unit.target: 这个属性表示命令的种类,可以是三个值中的一个。

trans-unit.source: This attribute indicates the kind of command. This can be one of three values.
trans-unit.target: 此属性表示命令的种类。可以是三个值中的一个。

trans-unit.source: This attribute indicates the kind of menu being declared, and can be one of two values.
trans-unit.target: 这个属性表示被声明的菜单种类,可以是两个值中的一个。

trans-unit.source: This attribute indicates the language of the linked resource. It is purely advisory. Allowed values are determined by BCP47. Use this attribute only if the href attribute is present.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指示链接资源的语言。这纯粹是建议性的。允许值由BCP47确定。仅当存在 href 属性时才使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: This attribute indicates the number of times a sound is to be played and either has a numeric value or the keyword infinite.
trans-unit.target: 该属性表示一个声音的播放次数,可以是一个数值,也可以是关键字 "无限"。

trans-unit.source: This attribute indicates the optimal numeric value. It must be within the range (as defined by the min attribute and max attribute). When used with the low attribute and high attribute, it gives an indication where along the range is considered preferable. For example, if it is between the min attribute and the low attribute, then the lower range is considered preferred.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指示最佳数值。它必须在范围内（由 min 属性和 max 属性定义）。当与 low 属性和 high 属性一起使用时，它会指示在该范围内哪个位置更好。例如，如果它在 min 属性和 low 属性之间，则将较低范围视为首选。

trans-unit.source: This attribute indicates the optimal numeric value. It must be within the range (as defined by the min attribute and max attribute). When used with the low attribute and high attribute, it gives an indication where along the range is considered preferable. For example, if it is between the min attribute and the low attribute, then the lower range is considered preferred. The browser may color the meter's bar differently depending on whether the value is less than or equal to the optimum value.

This attribute indicates the time and date of the change and must be a valid date string with an optional time. If the value cannot be parsed as a date with an optional time string, the element does not have an associated time stamp.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指示更改的时间和日期，并且必须是有效的日期字符串，带有可选的时间。如果无法使用可选的时间字符串将值解析为日期，则该元素没有关联的时间戳。

trans-unit.source: This attribute indicates the time and date of the change and must be a valid date with an optional time string. If the value cannot be parsed as a date with an optional time string, the element does not have an associated time stamp.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指示更改的时间和日期，并且必须是有效日期，并带有可选的时间字符串。如果无法使用可选的时间字符串将值解析为日期，则该元素没有关联的时间戳。

trans-unit.source: This attribute indicates the time and date of the change and must be a valid date string with an optional time. If the value cannot be parsed as a date with an optional time string, the element does not have an associated time stamp. For the format of the string without a time, see Date strings. The format of the string if it includes both date and time is covered in Local date and time strings.

This attribute indicates the time and date of the change and must be a valid date with an optional time string. If the value cannot be parsed as a date with an optional time string, the element does not have an associated time stamp. For the format of the string without a time, see Format of a valid date string. The format of the string if it includes both date and time is covered in Format of a valid local date and time string.
This attribute indicates the time and/or date of the element and must be in one of the formats described below.
trans-unit.target: 这个属性表示元素的时间和/或日期,必须是下面描述的格式之一。

trans-unit.source: This attribute indicates the type of script represented. The value of this attribute will be in one of the following categories:
trans-unit.target: 此属性表示所代表的脚本类型。该属性的值将属于以下类别之一:

trans-unit.source: This attribute indicates whether the value of the control can be automatically completed by the browser. Possible values are:
trans-unit.target: 此属性表示控件的值是否可以由浏览器自动完成。可能的值是:

trans-unit.source: This attribute instructs browsers to download a URL instead of navigating to it, so the user will be prompted to save it as a local file. If the attribute has a value, it is used as the pre-filled file name in the Save prompt (the user can still change the file name if they want). There are no restrictions on allowed values, though / and \ are converted to underscores. Most file systems limit some punctuation in file names, and browsers will adjust the suggested name accordingly.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指示浏览器下载URL而不是导航到URL，因此将提示用户将URL保存为本地文件。如果属性具有值，则将其用作“保存”提示中的预填充文件名（用户仍然可以根据需要更改文件名）。尽管 / 和 \ 转换为下划线，但对允许的值没有限制。大多数文件系统在文件名中都限制了一些标点符号，浏览器会相应地调整建议的名称。

trans-unit.source: This attribute is enumerated and not Boolean. A value of true or false is mandatory, and shorthand like <img draggable> is forbidden. The correct usage is <img draggable="false">.
This attribute is not inherited by the <bdi> element. If not set, its value is auto.
trans-unit.target: <bdi> 元素不继承此属性。如果未设置，则其值为 auto 。

trans-unit.source: This attribute is also available on <input type="image"> and <button> elements.
This attribute is also available on <input type="image"> elements.
trans-unit.target: 此属性在 <input type="image"> 元素上也可用。

trans-unit.source: This attribute is also available on <input type="image"> and <input type="submit"> elements.
This attribute is also available on <input type="submit"> and <button> elements.
This attribute is also available on <input type="submit"> elements.
trans-unit.target: 此属性在 <input type="submit"> 元素上也可用。

trans-unit.source: This attribute is also used when copying and pasting the image to text, or saving a linked image to a bookmark.

This attribute is an enumerated one and not a Boolean one. This means that the explicit usage of one of the values true or false is mandatory and that a shorthand like <label draggable>Example Label</label> is not allowed. The correct usage is <label draggable="true">Example Label</label>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是枚举属性，而不是布尔值。这意味着必须明确使用值 true 或 false 之一，并且不允许使用诸如 <label draggable>Example Label</label> 类的速记。正确的用法是 <label draggable="true">Example Label</label> 。

trans-unit.source: This attribute is an enumerated one and not a Boolean one. This means that the explicit usage of one of the values true or false is mandatory and that a shorthand like <label spellcheck>Example Label</label> is not allowed. The correct usage is <label spellcheck="true">Example Label</label>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是枚举属性，而不是布尔值。这意味着必须明确使用值 true 或 false 之一，并且不允许使用诸如 <label spellcheck>Example Label</label> 类的速记。正确的用法是 <label spellcheck="true">Example Label</label> 。

trans-unit.source: This attribute is an enumerated one and not a Boolean one. This means that the explicit usage of one of the values true, false or the empty string is mandatory and that a shorthand like <label contenteditable>Example Label</label> is not allowed. The correct usage is <label contenteditable="true">Example Label</label>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是枚举属性，而不是布尔值。这意味着必须明确使用值true，false或空字符串之一，并且不允许使用诸如 <label contenteditable>Example Label</label> 类的缩写。正确的用法是 <label contenteditable="true">Example Label</label> 。

trans-unit.source: This attribute is considered a legacy attribute and redefined as allow="fullscreen".
trans-unit.target: 该属性被认为是旧属性，并重新定义为 allow="fullscreen" 。

trans-unit.source: This attribute is considered a legacy attribute and redefined as allow="payment".
trans-unit.target: 该属性被认为是旧属性，并重新定义为 allow="payment" 。

trans-unit.source: This attribute is mandatory for the <bdo> element where it has a different semantic meaning.
trans-unit.target: 对于具有不同语义含义的 <bdo> 元素，此属性是必需的。

trans-unit.source: This attribute is merely a hint for the browser: browsers are not required to be able to check for spelling errors. Typically non-editable elements are not checked for spelling errors, even if the spellcheck attribute is set to true and the browser supports spellchecking.
trans-unit.target: 该属性仅是浏览器的提示：浏览器不需要能够检查拼写错误。通常，即使将spellcheck属性设置为true且浏览器支持拼写检查，也不会检查不可编辑元素的拼写错误。

trans-unit.source: This attribute is merely a hint for the browser: browsers are not required to check for spelling errors. Typically non-editable elements are not checked for spelling errors, even if the spellcheck attribute is set to true and the browser supports spellchecking.

This attribute is not only obsolete, but was rarely implemented anyway. To achieve the same effect as the char attribute, set the CSS text-align property to the same string you would specify for the char property, such as text-align: ".".
trans-unit.target: 此属性不仅过时，而且无论如何很少实现。为了获得与 char 属性相同的效果，请将CSS text-align 属性设置为您为 char 属性指定的相同字符串，例如 text-align: "." 。

trans-unit.source: This attribute is obsolete, and was never widely supported anyway.
trans-unit.target: 这个属性已经过时了,反正从来没有被广泛支持过。

trans-unit.source: This attribute is only used when rel="preload" has been set on the <link> element. It specifies the type of content being loaded by the <link>, which is necessary for content prioritization, request matching, application of correct content security policy, and setting of correct Accept request header.
trans-unit.target: 仅在 <link> 元素上设置 rel="preload" 时才使用此属性。它指定 <link> 加载的内容的类型，这对于内容优先级，请求匹配，正确的内容安全策略的应用以及正确的 Accept request标头的设置是必需的。

trans-unit.source: This attribute is only used when rel="preload" or rel="prefetch" has been set on the <link> element. It specifies the type of content being loaded by the <link>, which is necessary for request matching, application of correct content security policy, and setting of correct Accept request header. Furthermore, rel="preload" uses this as a signal for request prioritization. The table below lists the valid values for this attribute and the elements or resources they apply to.
This attribute is text for the label indicating the meaning of the option. If the label attribute isn't defined, its value is that of the element text content.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是标签的文本，指示选项的含义。如果未定义 label 属性，则其值为元素文本内容的值。

trans-unit.source: This attribute is used for labeling frames. Without labeling, every link will open in the frame that it’s in – the closest parent frame. See the target attribute for more information.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于标记框架。如果不加标签，则每个链接都将在其所在的框架（最接近的父框架）中打开。有关更多信息，请参见 target 属性。

trans-unit.source: This attribute is used to define a recommended cell height.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于定义推荐的单元格高度。

trans-unit.source: This attribute is used to define a recommended cell height. Use the CSS height property instead.

This attribute is used to define a recommended cell width. Additional space can be added with the cellspacing and cellpadding properties and the width of the <col> element can also create extra width. But, if a column's width is too narrow to show a particular cell properly, it will be widened when displayed.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于定义建议的像元宽度。可以使用 cellspacing 和 cellpadding 属性添加额外的空间，并且 <col> 元素的宽度也可以创建额外的宽度。但是，如果列的宽度太窄而无法正确显示特定的单元格，则显示时它将变宽。

trans-unit.source: This attribute is used to define a recommended cell width. Additional space can be added with the cellspacing and cellpadding properties and the width of the <col> element can also create extra width. But, if a column's width is too narrow to show a particular cell properly, it will be widened when displayed.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于定义建议的像元宽度。可以使用cellpacing和cellpadding属性添加额外的空间，并且 <col> 元素的宽度也可以创建额外的宽度。但是，如果列的宽度太窄而无法正确显示特定的单元格，则显示时它将变宽。

trans-unit.source: This attribute is used to define a recommended cell width. Use the CSS width property instead.

This attribute is used to define the type of the content linked to. The value of the attribute should be a MIME type such as text/html, text/css, and so on. The common use of this attribute is to define the type of stylesheet being referenced (such as text/css), but given that CSS is the only stylesheet language used on the web, not only is it possible to omit the type attribute, but is actually now recommended practice. It is also used on rel="preload" link types, to make sure the browser only downloads file types that it supports.

This attribute is used to define the type of the content linked to. The value of the attribute should be a MIME type such as text/html, text/css, and so on. The common use of this attribute is to define the type of stylesheet being referenced (such as text/css), but given that CSS is the only stylesheet language used on the web, not only is it possible to omit the type attribute, but is actually now recommended practice. It is also used on rel="preload" link types, to make sure the browser only downloads file types that it supports.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于定义链接到的内容的类型。该属性的值应为MIME类型，例如text / html，text / css等。此属性的常用用法是定义所引用的样式表的类型（例如text / css），但是鉴于CSS是网络上使用的唯一样式表语言，不仅可以省略type属性，而且可以实际上现在建议练习。它还用于 rel="preload" 链接类型，以确保浏览器仅下载其支持的文件类型。

trans-unit.source: This attribute is used to disable a link relationship. In conjunction with scripting, this attribute could be used to turn on and off various style sheet relationships.
trans-unit.target: 这个属性用于禁用链接关系。结合脚本,这个属性可以用来开启和关闭各种样式表关系。

trans-unit.source: This attribute is used to indicate the number of characters to offset the column data from the alignment character specified by the char attribute.
This attribute is used to indicate the number of characters to offset the column data from the alignment character specified by the char attribute.

This attribute is used to indicate the number of characters to offset the column data from the alignment characters specified by the char attribute.

trans-unit.source: This attribute is used to position the applet on the page relative to content that might flow around it. The HTML 4.01 specification defines values of bottom, left, middle, right, and top, whereas Microsoft and Netscape also might support absbottom, absmiddle, baseline, center, and texttop.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于相对于可能在其周围流动的内容在页面上放置小程序。HTML 4.01规范定义了 bottom ， left ， middle ， right 和 top 的值，而Microsoft和Netscape也可能支持 absbottom ， absmiddle ， baseline ， center 和 texttop 。

trans-unit.source: This attribute is used to specify the name of the control.

trans-unit.source: This attribute lets you associate <button> elements to <form>s anywhere in the document, not just inside a <form>. It can also override an ancestor <form> element.
This attribute lets you associate <output> elements to <form>s anywhere in the document, not just inside a <form>. It can also override an ancestor <form> element.
This attribute lets you associate <select> elements to <form>s anywhere in the document, not just inside a <form>. It can also override an ancestor <form> element.

This attribute lets you specify the form element to which the select element is associated (that is, its "form owner"). If this attribute is specified, its value must be the same as the id of a form element in the same document. This enables you to place select elements anywhere within a document, not just as descendants of their form elements.
trans-unit.target: 此属性使您可以指定与select元素关联的form元素（即，其“ form owner”）。如果指定了此属性，则其值必须与同一文档中表单元素的 id 相同。这使您可以将选择元素放置在文档中的任何位置，而不仅仅是它们的表单元素的后代。

trans-unit.source: This attribute may be re-introduced in the future per https://github.com/w3c/csswg-drafts/issues/3547. If you want to use the attribute now, you can use a polyfill.
This attribute must not be used if the src attribute is absent (i.e. for inline scripts), in this case it would have no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果不存在 src 属性（即，对于内联脚本），则不得使用此属性，在这种情况下，它将无效。

trans-unit.source: This attribute names a relationship of the linked document to the current document. The attribute must be a space-separated list of link type values.

trans-unit.source: This attribute on a <button> is nonstandard and Firefox-specific. Unlike other browsers, Firefox persists the dynamic disabled state of a <button> across page loads. Setting autocomplete="off" on the button disables this feature; see bug 654072.
This attribute only works for same-origin URLs.

trans-unit.source: This attribute specifies a default width for each column in the current column group. In addition to the standard pixel and percentage values, this attribute might take the special form 0*, which means that the width of each column in the group should be the minimum width necessary to hold the column's contents. Relative widths such as 0.5* also can be used.
trans-unit.target: 此属性为当前列组中的每个列指定默认宽度。除了标准的像素和百分比值之外，此属性还可以采用特殊形式 0* ，这意味着组中每一列的宽度应为容纳该列内容所需的最小宽度。也可以使用相对宽度，例如 0.5* 。

trans-unit.source: This attribute specifies a default width for each column in the current column group. Relative widths such as 5* also can be used.
This attribute specifies additional horizontal space, in pixels, to be reserved on either side of the applet.
trans-unit.target: 这个属性指定了小程序两边要保留的额外水平空间,单位为像素。

trans-unit.source: This attribute specifies how much of the task that has been completed. It must be a valid floating point number between 0 and max, or between 0 and 1 if max is omitted. If there is no value attribute, the progress bar is indeterminate; this indicates that an activity is ongoing with no indication of how long it is expected to take.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指定已完成的任务量。它必须介于0和一个有效的浮点数 max ，或0和1之间，如果 max 被省略。如果没有 value 属性，则进度条不确定。这表明活动正在进行中，没有指示预计需要多长时间。

trans-unit.source: This attribute specifies how much of the task that has been completed. It must be a valid floating point number between 0 and max, or between 0 and 1 if max is omitted. If there is no value attribute, the progress bar is indeterminate; this indicates that an activity is ongoing with no indication of how long it is expected to take.
This attribute specifies in pixels the width that the applet needs.
trans-unit.target: 该属性以像素为单位指定小程序所需的宽度。

trans-unit.target: 这个属性指定了

trans-unit.source: This attribute specifies the alignment of the content in a column to a character. Typical values for this include a period (.) when attempting to align numbers or monetary values. If align is not set to char, this attribute is ignored.
This attribute specifies the document that will be displayed by the frame.

trans-unit.source: This attribute specifies the font size as either a numeric or relative value. Numeric values range from 1 to 7 with 1 being the smallest and 3 the default. It can be defined using a relative value, like +2 or -3, which set it relative to the value of the size attribute of the <basefont> element, or relative to 3, the default value, if none does exist.
trans-unit.target: 此属性将字体大小指定为数字值或相对值。数值范围为 1 到 7 ,其中 1 为最小值，默认值为 3 。可以使用相对值来定义它，例如 +2 或 -3 ，将其相对于 <basefont> 元素的 size 属性值设置，或者相对于默认值 3 进行设置（如果不存在）。

trans-unit.source: This attribute specifies the height, in pixels, that the applet needs.

trans-unit.source: This attribute specifies the media that the linked resource applies to. Its value must be a media type / media query. This attribute is mainly useful when linking to external stylesheets — it allows the user agent to pick the best adapted one for the device it runs on.

trans-unit.source: This attribute specifies where to display the linked resource. In HTML4, this is the name of, or a keyword for, a frame. In HTML5, it is a name of, or keyword for, a browsing context (for example, tab, window, or inline frame). The following keywords have special meanings:

trans-unit.source: This attribute takes the value of the id attribute of a <form> element you want the <fieldset> to be part of, even if it is not inside the form. Please note that usage of this is confusing — if you want the <input> elements inside the <fieldset> to be associated with the form, you need to use the form attribute directly on those elements. You can check which elements are associated with a form via JavaScript, using HTMLFormElement.elements.
This attribute takes the value of the id attribute of a <form> element you want the <fieldset> to be part of, even if it is not inside the form.
trans-unit.target: 此属性采用您希望 <fieldset> 属于的 <form> 元素的 id 属性的值，即使该元素不在表单内部也是如此。

trans-unit.source: This attribute tells the browser to ignore the actual intrinsic size of the image and pretend it’s the size specified in the attribute. Specifically, the image would raster at these dimensions and naturalWidth/naturalHeight on images would return the values specified in this attribute. Explainer, examples
This attribute tells the browser to ignore the actual intrinsic size of the image and pretend it’s the size specified in the attribute.

This attribute tells the browser to ignore the actual intrinsic size of the image and pretend it’s the size specified in the attribute. Specifically, the image would raster at these dimensions and naturalWidth/naturalHeight on images would return the values specified in this attribute. Explainer, examples
trans-unit.target: 该属性告诉浏览器忽略图像的实际固有尺寸，并假装它是该属性中指定的尺寸。具体来说，图像将在这些尺寸下进行光栅化，图像上的 naturalWidth / naturalHeight 将返回在此属性中指定的值。解释器，示例

trans-unit.source: This attribute was hidden behind a pref because no other browsers support it (See bug 1291515).
trans-unit.target: 该属性被隐藏在首选项之后，因为没有其他浏览器支持它（请参见Bug 1291515）。

trans-unit.source: This attribute was required for anchors defining a possible target location within a page. In HTML 4.01, id and name could be used simultaneously on a <a> element as long as they have identical values.
trans-unit.target: 锚点在页面中定义可能的目标位置时需要此属性。在HTML 4.01中，只要 id 和 name 具有相同的值，就可以在 <a> 元素上同时使用它们。

trans-unit.source: This attribute was used to define a region for hyperlinks to create an image map. The values are circle, default, polygon, and rect. The format of the coords attribute depends on the value of shape. For circle, the value is x,y,r where x and y are the pixel coordinates for the center of the circle and r is the radius value in pixels. For rect, the coords attribute should be x,y,w,h. The x,y values define the upper-left-hand corner of the rectangle, while w and h define the width and height respectively. A value of polygon for shape requires x1,y1,x2,y2,... values for coords. Each of the x,y pairs defines a point in the polygon, with successive points being joined by straight lines and the last point joined to the first. The value default for shape requires that the entire enclosed area, typically an image, be used.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于定义超链接的区域以创建图像映射。值是 circle ， default ， polygon 和 rect 。coords属性的格式取决于shape的值。对于 circle ，值是 x,y,r ，其中 x 和 y 是圆心的像素坐标， r 是以像素为单位的半径值。对于 rect ，coords属性应为 x,y,w,h 。的 x,y 值定义了矩形的上左角，而 w 和 h 分别定义宽度和高度。的价值 polygon 的形状要求 x1,y1,x2,y2,... 值COORDS。每个 x,y 对在多边形中定义一个点，连续的点通过直线连接，最后的点与第一个连接。形状的 default 值要求使用整个封闭区域，通常是图像。

trans-unit.source: This attribute's value is an opaque string: this means that web author must not use it to convey any information. Particular meaning, for example semantic meaning, must not be derived from the string.
trans-unit.target: 这个属性的值是一个不透明的字符串:这意味着网络作者不能用它来传递任何信息。不能从该字符串中得出特定的含义,例如语义。

trans-unit.source: This attribute's value is an opaque string: this means that web authors should not rely on it to convey human-readable information (although having your IDs somewhat human-readable can be useful for code comprehension, e.g. consider ticket-18659 versus r45tgfe-freds&$@).

This attribute's value must not contain whitespace (spaces, tabs etc.). Browsers treat non-conforming IDs that contain whitespace as if the whitespace is part of the ID. In contrast to the class attribute, which allows space-separated values, elements can only have one single ID.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值不得包含空格（空格，制表符等）。浏览器将包含空格的不合格ID视为空白是​​ID的一部分。与允许使用空格分隔值的class属性相反，元素只能具有一个ID。

trans-unit.source: This attribute, if present, indicates that the author intends the hyperlink to be used for downloading a resource. See <a> for a full description of the download attribute.
trans-unit.target: 此属性（如果存在）表明作者打算将超链接用于下载资源。有关 download 属性的完整说明，请参见 <a> 。

trans-unit.source: This attribute, supported by Internet Explorer 4 and higher, specifies the column name from the data source object that supplies the bound data. This attribute might be used to specify the various <param> elements passed to the Java applet.
trans-unit.target: Internet Explorer 4和更高版本支持此属性，它从提供绑定数据的数据源对象中指定列名。此属性可用于指定传递给Java applet 的各种 <param> 元素。

trans-unit.source: This bug has been fixed in IE8.
trans-unit.target: 这个错误在IE8中已经被修复。

trans-unit.source: This can be one or more of internet, x400, or pref. The pref type indicates the preferred email address.
trans-unit.target: 这可以是 internet ， x400 或 pref 中的一项或多项。该 pref 类型指明了首选的电子邮件地址。

trans-unit.source: This example demonstrates how to offer a video in Ogg format for users whose browsers support Ogg format, and a QuickTime format video for users whose browsers support that. If the audio or video element is not supported by the browser, a notice is displayed instead. If the browser supports the element but does not support any of the specified formats, an error event is raised and the default media controls (if enabled) will indicate an error. Be sure to reference our guide to media types and formats on the web for details on what media file formats you can use and how well they're supported by browsers.

This example demonstrates how to offer a video in Ogg format for users whose browsers support Ogg format, and a QuickTime format video for users whose browsers support that. If the audio or video element is not supported by the browser, a notice is displayed instead. If the browser supports the element but does not support any of the specified formats, an error event is raised and the default media controls (if enabled) will indicate an error. See also the list of media formats supported by the audio and video elements in various browsers.
trans-unit.target: 本示例演示如何为浏览器支持Ogg格式的用户提供Ogg格式的视频，以及为浏览器支持Ogg格式的用户提供QuickTime格式的视频。如果浏览器不支持 audio 或 video 元素，则会显示一条通知。如果浏览器支持该元素但不支持任何指定的格式，则会引发 error 事件，并且默认媒体控件（如果启用）将指示错误。另请参阅各种浏览器中音频和视频元素支持的媒体格式列表。

This example plays a video when activated, providing the user with the browser's default video controls to control playback.
trans-unit.target: 这个例子在激活时播放视频,为用户提供浏览器默认的视频控件来控制播放。

trans-unit.source: This example shows a <details> element with no provided summary.
trans-unit.target: 本示例显示了一个 <details> 元素，但未提供摘要。

trans-unit.source: This example shows a disabled <fieldset> with two controls inside it. Note how both the controls are disabled due to being inside a disabled <fieldset>.
trans-unit.target: 本示例显示了一个禁用的 <fieldset> ,其中带有两个控件。请注意，由于处于禁用的 <fieldset> 中,如何同时禁用这两个控件。

trans-unit.source: This example shows a really simple <fieldset> example, with a <legend>, and a single control inside it.
trans-unit.target: 此示例显示了一个非常简单的 <fieldset> 示例，其中带有 <legend> ，并且内部有一个控件。

trans-unit.source: This example shows how you could use some CSS and JavaScript to provide extensive custom styling for a <select> box.

This example shows two <textarea>s — one of which is disabled, and one of which is readonly. Have a play with both and you'll see the difference in behavior — the disabled element is not selectable in any way (and its value is not submitted), whereas the readonly element is selectable and its contents copyable (and its value is submitted); you just can't edit the contents.
trans-unit.target: 此示例显示了两个 <textarea> ，其中一个被 disabled ，另一个是 readonly 。两者兼而有之，您会看到行为上的差异— disabled 元素无法以任何方式选择（并且其值未提交），而 readonly 元素是可选的并且其内容可复制（并且其值已提交） ; 您只是无法编辑内容。

trans-unit.source: This example simply uses a plain <dfn> element to identify the location of a term within the definition.
trans-unit.target: 本示例仅使用普通的 <dfn> 元素来标识术语在定义中的位置。

trans-unit.source: This example specifies which audio track to embed using the src attribute on a nested <source> element rather than directly on the <audio> element. It is always useful to include the file's MIME type inside the type attribute, as the browser is able to instantly tell if it can play that file, and not waste time on it if not.
trans-unit.target: 此示例使用嵌套的 <source> 元素而不是直接在 <audio> 元素上使用 src 属性指定要嵌入的音频轨道。将文件的MIME类型包含在 type 属性中总是有用的，因为浏览器能够立即判断它是否可以播放该文件，并且如果不可以，则不会浪费时间。

trans-unit.source: This example uses <aside> to mark up a paragraph in an article. The paragraph is only indirectly related to the main article content:
This example uses <tt> to show text entered into, and output by, a terminal application.
trans-unit.target: 本示例使用 <tt> 来显示输入到终端应用程序和由终端应用程序输出的文本。

trans-unit.source: This example uses NETWORK and FALLBACK sections to specify that the network.html page must always be retrieved from the network, and that the fallback.html page should be served as a fallback resource (e.g., in case a connection to the server cannot be established).
trans-unit.target: 本示例使用 NETWORK 和 FALLBACK 部分来指定必须始终从网络中检索 network.html 页面，并且 fallback.html 页面应用作后备资源（例如，在无法建立与服务器的连接的情况下） ）。

trans-unit.source: This example uses an image to link to the MDN home page. The home page will open in a new browsing context, that is, a new page or a new tab.
trans-unit.target: 这个例子使用了一个图片来链接到MDN的主页。主页将在一个新的浏览环境中打开,即一个新的页面或新的标签页。

trans-unit.source: This example uses ruby annotations to display the Romaji equivalents for each character.
trans-unit.target: 本示例使用红宝石注释显示每个字符的罗马字等效项。

trans-unit.source: This example uses the <u> element and some CSS to display a paragraph which includes a misspelled error, with the error indicated in the red wavy underline style which is fairly commonly used for this purpose.

trans-unit.source: This example uses the CSS font-size property to increase the font size by one level.

trans-unit.source: This form provides a slider whose value can range between 0 and 100. and an <input> element into which you can enter a second number. The two numbers are added together and the result is displayed in the <output> element each time the value of any of the controls changes.

trans-unit.source: This integer attribute defines, in pixels, the size of the frame surrounding the table. If set to 0, the frame attribute is set to void.
trans-unit.target: 此整数属性以像素为单位定义表格周围框架的大小。如果设置为0，则 frame 属性设置为void。

trans-unit.source: This integer attribute indicates the current ordinal value of the list item as defined by the <ol> element. The only allowed value for this attribute is a number, even if the list is displayed with Roman numerals or letters. List items that follow this one continue numbering from the value set. The value attribute has no meaning for unordered lists (<ul>) or for menus (<menu>).
trans-unit.target: 此整数属性指示由 <ol> 元素定义的列表项的当前顺序值。即使列表以罗马数字或字母显示，此属性唯一允许的值为数字。列表项之后的列表项将从值集中继续编号。所述值属性具有用于无序列表没有意义（ <ul> ）或菜单（ <menu> ）。

trans-unit.source: This integer attribute specifies the start value for numbering the individual list items. Although the ordering type of list elements might be Roman numerals, such as XXXI, or letters, the value of start is always represented as a number. To start numbering elements from the letter "C", use <ol start="3">.
trans-unit.target: 此整数属性指定为各个列表项编号的起始值。尽管列表元素的排序类型可能是罗马数字，例如XXXI或字母，但是start的值始终表示为数字。要从字母“ C”开始编号元素，请使用 <ol start="3"> 。

trans-unit.source: This is a Boolean attribute indicating that the browser should, if possible, load the script asynchronously.

trans-unit.source: This is a boolean attribute: the presence of a boolean attribute on an element represents the true value, and the absence of the attribute represents the false value.

trans-unit.source: This is actually one of the common attributes, but it has a special meaning available for hidden inputs. Normally, the name attribute functions on hidden inputs just like on any other input. However, when the form is submitted, a hidden input whose name is set to "_charset_" will automatically be reported with the value set to the character encoding used to submit the form.
trans-unit.target: 这实际上是常见属性之一，但是对于隐藏的输入具有特殊含义。通常， name 属性在隐藏输入上起作用，就像在其他任何输入上一样。但是，提交表单时，将自动报告 name 设置为 "_charset_" 的隐藏输入，其值设置为用于提交表单的字符编码。

trans-unit.source: This is actually one of the common attributes, but it has a special meaning available for hidden inputs. Normally, the name attribute functions on hidden inputs just like on any other input. However, when the form is submitted, a hidden input whose name is set to _charset_ will automatically be reported with the value set to the character encoding used to submit the form.

This is an interesting idea, which goes to show a potential solution to the problem of dealing with international phone numbers. trans-unit.source: This module explores how to use HTML to include multimedia in your web pages, including the different ways that images can be included, and how to embed video, audio, and even entire other webpages.

trans-unit.source: This module sets the stage, getting you used to important concepts and syntax such as looking at applying HTML to text, how to create hyperlinks, and how to use HTML to structure a web page.

trans-unit.source: This range control is using a list attribute specifying the ID of a <datalist> which defines a series of hash marks on the control. There are eleven of them, so that there's one at 0% as well as at each 10% mark. Each point is represented using an <option> element with its value set to the range's value at which a mark should be drawn.
trans-unit.target: 此范围控件使用的 list 属性指定 <datalist> 的ID，该ID 定义了控件上的一系列哈希标记。一共有11个，因此在0％和每个10％标记处都有一个。每个点都使用 <option> 元素表示，其 value 设置为应绘制标记的范围值。
